procedure.preparationText:
To complete your application, you must be in possession :

  • a certificate of registration or pre-enrollment in a French school,
  • proof of sufficient financial resources, or greater than or equal to 615 â‚¬ monthly (grant certificate, bank statement, pay stubs or proof of support by a guarantor),
  • in case of change of civil status , a valid passport and an extract of your birth certificate with filiation or a full copy of your birth certificate,
  • in case of change of address, proof of address,

All supporting documents must be accompanied, where appropriate, a translation into French by a certified translator interpreter.

form.subtitle: You are about to make a temporary student residency card renewal application. Before paying, make sure that the information below are correct.

form.informations: Your residency taxes amount to 49.00 euros. They will not be debited in case of a favorable decision.

The admissibility of your application will be verified by the Administration of foreigners in France.
If your application is not admissible, we will tell you and you will specify the reason(s) element(s) missing(s) the if any.

If your application is admissible, your case will be heard and you will be notified of the decision.
If the decision is favorable and after flow of tourist taxes, you will be prompted to come pick up your residence permit when available.
If the decision is unfavorable, you will be informed of the remedies you have.
